0x8E51EC29.name: SET_PED_MELEE_COMBAT_LIMITS

params.name: primaryCount
params.description: The number of peds that engage in combat (default: 1)

params.name: secondaryCount
params.description: The number of peds that engage in taunting (default: 3)

params.name: populationPedCount
params.description: The maximum number of population peds (ambient and scenario) that can engage in combat (default: 3)

0x8E51EC29.description:
Override the limits on the number and types of melee combatants. The game is limited to at most ten combatants among the three types: primary, secondary, and observers.

This native infers the number of observers based on the primary and secondary counts.
